title: Solving Absolute Value Equations
body: Find the value of $$x$$. If there are two values of $$x$$, enter your answer in the form $$"x=a$$ or $$x=b"$$ without the quotes, and with a and $$b$$ representing the values of $$x$$. Let a be the smaller value of $$x$$ and $$b$$ be the larger value of $$x$$. Example: $$x=\frac{-1}{5}$$ or $$x=3$$
